T02D1620:163a-0: @163a * // gdan bzhi'i de kho na nyid bzhi pa bzhugs//
T02D1620:163a-2: # // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1620:163a-3: nam mkha'i btsun mo dang 'dus las //
T02D1620:163a-4: dpal ldan dga' ba bzhi ston pa //
T02D1620:163a-5: 'jig rten gsum po bskyed pa'i mgon //
T02D1620:163a-6: sna tshogs gzugs can de la 'dud //
T02D1620:163a-7: gdan bzhi'i rim pa las 'ongs pa //
T02D1620:163a-8: 'khor lo bzhi la yang dag gnas //
T02D1620:163a-9: de nyid bzhi zhes gang bshad pa //
T02D1620:163a-10: de ni bdag gis gsal bar bri //
T02D1620:163a-11: dag byas bde ba'i stan gnas te //
T02D1620:163a-12: mdun du bde gshegs yang dag mchod //
T02D1620:163a-13: blo ldan ma lus stong bsgoms nas //
T02D1620:163a-14: rgyud las gsungs pa bsam par bya //
T02D1620:163a-15: lhun po'i rtse mor khang brtsegs ni //
T02D1620:163a-16: shing tu mdzes pa yid du 'ong //
T02D1620:163a-17: der ni byang chub sems nyid las //
T02D1620:163a-18: sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //
T02D1620:163a-19: rkang pa'i mthil du gnas pa yi //
T02D1620:163a-20: rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu lta bu //
T02D1620:163a-21: ji srid lte ba'i mtsho skyes su //
T02D1620:163a-22: rim gyis steng du 'gro ba ste//
T02D1620:163a-23: de nas me yig las byung ba //
T02D1620:163a-24: me yi dkyil 'khor gru gsum tshul //
T02D1620:163a-25: 'dis ni bdag dang kun bsregs nas //
T02D1620:163a-26: sna tshogs nam mkha' mtshungs par bsam //
T02D1620:163a-27: de nas sngags dang mtshan ma yi //
T02D1620:163a-28: cho ga rim pas lus su bsgom //
T02D1620:163a-29: seng ge'i stan la gnas pa yi //
T02D1620:163a-31: me dang chu yi dbus gnas pa //
T02D1620:163a-33: der ni kun du rnam 'phro ba'o //
T02D1620:163a-34: sde mtshan dang po bsam byas te //
T02D1620:163a-35: gang dang kun da zla 'dra ba'i //
T02D1620:163a-36: 'od zer tshogs ni shin tu bsil //
T02D1620:163a-37: sangs rgyas tshogs chen rnams 'phro ba'o //
T02D1620:163a-38: sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu'i 'od //
T02D1620:163a-39: ye shes lha mo'i bdag nyid gsal //
T02D1620:163a-40: chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin nyid //
T02D1620:163a-41: dbugs kyi rlung la zhon nas su //
T02D1620:163a-43: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro //
T02D1620:163a-44: reg bya dang ni chos kyi khams //
T02D1620:163a-45: gzhan yang mig dang rna ba dang //
T02D1620:163a-46: sna dang lce dang lus dang yid //
T02D1620:163a-47: rnam shes drug dang 'byung ba dang //
T02D1620:163a-48: 'byung las gyur dang phung po lnga //
T02D1620:163a-49: brtan pa dang ni g-yo ba'o //
T02D1620:163a-50: 'gro ba thams cad de las byung //
T02D1620:163a-51: shar dang lus ngan phyogs su ni //
T02D1620:163a-52: dbyangs yig dang po gnyis pa dgod //
T02D1620:163a-53: nub tu bcu pa'i mtha' ma ste //
T02D1620:163a-54: lho yi 'dab mar de yi mtha' //
T02D1620:163b-0: mkha' 'gro ma dang drag mo'i @163b gzugs //
T02D1620:163b-1: ro langs ma dang gtum mo dang //
T02D1620:163b-2: seng ge stag dang ce sbyang mo //
T02D1620:163b-3: 'ug pa mo ste mtshams bzhir dgod //
T02D1620:163b-4: dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar //
T02D1620:163b-5: sngo dang sngo bsangs bzhi pa'o //
T02D1620:163b-6: mtshams su kha dog 'dres ma ru //
T02D1620:163b-7: ma ning las skyes bsam par bya //
T02D1620:163b-8: zhal gcig phyag gnyis shin tu drag / lha yi rgyan gyis shin tu klubs //
T02D1620:163b-9: spyan gsum khro zhing bzhad pa ste //
T02D1620:163b-10: kha tv'am ga dang mi thod ldan //
T02D1620:163b-11: mtshams kyi lha mo g-yon na ni //
T02D1620:163b-12: sdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa rnams //
T02D1620:163b-13: ral gri lcags kyu dgra sta dang //
T02D1620:163b-14: dbyug pa rnams te phyag g-yas na'o //
T02D1620:163b-15: lha mo rdo rje cod pan can //
T02D1620:163b-16: stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can //
T02D1620:163b-17: mi yi pags pa'i bla gos dang //
T02D1620:163b-18: sgeg pa yi ni nyams kyis mdzes //
T02D1620:163b-19: mche ba can dang cod pan can //
T02D1620:163b-20: ngang pa ci bgyi phyogs kyi gdan //
T02D1620:163b-21: mtshams su seng ge stags gdong dang //
T02D1620:163b-22: 'ug pa dang ni ce sbyang ngo //
T02D1620:163b-23: mkha' 'gro ma dang mar me ma //
T02D1620:163b-25: ro dang yi ma'i stan bzhugs pa //
T02D1620:163b-26: rang gi gnas kyi mdog bzhin bsam //
T02D1620:163b-27: me long mnyam nyid so sor rtog //
T02D1620:163b-28: bya grub shin tu dag rnams las //
T02D1620:163b-29: sangs rgyas gzugs su bskyed nas su //
T02D1620:163b-30: rang gi rigs kyi phyag rgyas gdab //
T02D1620:163b-31: gang zhig phyi rol dkyil 'khor dga' //
T02D1620:163b-32: de yis de dag lus bsgoms nas //
T02D1620:163b-33: dbyangs yig dang po thig le'i gzugs //
T02D1620:163b-34: sngar bstan bzhin du lte bar bsgom //
T02D1620:163b-35: bdag nyid de ltar bsgoms nas su //
T02D1620:163b-36: dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya //
T02D1620:163b-37: sngags kyis bdag nyid ma bsten par //
T02D1620:163b-38: las rnams bya bar nus min pas / ji srid snang bar mthong ba'i bar //
T02D1620:163b-39: rnal 'byor can gyis de srid bsgom //
T02D1620:163b-40: mtshan ma thob na myur du ni //
T02D1620:163b-41: rtag tu grol ba'i dngos grub 'gro //
T02D1620:163b-42: kha sna mig dang rna ba ni //
T02D1620:163b-43: rang gi lag pas bsdams nas su //
T02D1620:163b-44: ma yengs blo yis bltas nas ni //
T02D1620:163b-45: yang dag sbyor bas thig le mthong //
T02D1620:163b-46: rlung dang me dang sa dang chu //
T02D1620:163b-47: 'khor lor bsgyur pa'i thig le ste //
T02D1620:163b-48: de yi mtshan nyid shes byas nas //
T02D1620:163b-49: las ni ji bzhin sbyar bar bya //
T02D1620:163b-50: dkar po snang na zhi bar bya //
T02D1620:163b-51: ser zhing dmar bas rgyas pa ste //
T02D1620:163b-52: sngon pos nang gi las ni bya //
T02D1620:164a-2: lag gnyis gsang bar mnyam gzhag ste //
T02D1620:164a-3: mchod rten 'og tu thur sel la //
T02D1620:164a-4: ka sha'i yi ge bltas nas su //
T02D1620:164a-5: shin tu mnyam par gzhag nas bsdam //
T02D1620:164a-6: mig gnyis sna rtser bltas nas su //
T02D1620:164a-7: rlung gis lte bar gsal bar bsam //
T02D1620:164a-8: gzugs ni stong par brtan byas na //
T02D1620:164a-9: yid bcing ba yi dam pa yin //
T02D1620:164a-10: rnam par snang mdzad dbyangs dang po //
T02D1620:164a-11: de bzhin sangs rgyas lngar ldan pas //
T02D1620:164a-12: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba ni //
T02D1620:164a-14: drod mtha' tsheg drag bcas pa dang //
T02D1620:164a-15: de nyid dgu pas brgyan pa dang //
T02D1620:164a-16: me la gnas shing ai yis brgyan //
T02D1620:164a-17: 'di yis rdzas rnams byin gyis brlab /
T02D1620:164a-20: ha ho hr'i: byin gyis brlab pa'o //
T02D1620:164a-21: aa a'a aam aa: ri r'i li l'i /
T02D1620:164a-23: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i sa bon no //
T02D1620:164a-24: rlung dang mi yi dkyil 'khor la //
T02D1620:164a-25: gnas pa yi ni thod pa la //
T02D1620:164a-26: lus las byung ba thams cad bsam //
T02D1620:164a-27: zla ba zhu ba'i tshul du gyur //
T02D1620:164a-28: de nas zla ba bar snang 'dzag //
T02D1620:164a-29: padma'i dbang phyug shin tu mdog mdzes shing //
T02D1620:164a-30: rnam par snang mdzad dri zhim btung bar mdzod //
T02D1620:164a-31: phyag na rdo rje ro bro rdo rje dbang //
T02D1620:164a-32: rnam gsum lha gsum du ni gzung bar bya //
T02D1620:164a-33: lte bar me yi rang bzhin bsam bya ba //
T02D1620:164a-34: 'od gsal 'od zer dra ba'i tshogs 'phro ba //
T02D1620:164a-35: nyi mar gnas la dag pa'i blo yis ni //
T02D1620:164a-36: bsreg pa'i lha la gtor na gos mi 'gyur //
T02D1620:164a-37: nang gi sems las sprul pa yi //
T02D1620:164a-38: bdag gi gdan ni bsgom pa dang //
T02D1620:164a-39: sngags dang thig le'i de kho na nyid kyi dum bu ste dang po'o /
T02D1620:164a-41: // / ye shes lus su bsgoms nas ni //
T02D1620:164a-42: thur sel rlung ni bsdams nas kyang //
T02D1620:164a-43: steng du drangs te bsdam byas la //
T02D1620:164a-45: chu shing me tog lta bu'i rtsa //
T02D1620:164a-46: snyid gar gnas shing 'og tu lta //
T02D1620:164a-47: sna tshogs padmas mdzes pa la //
T02D1620:164a-48: sa bon dag gis dgod bya ste //
T02D1620:164a-49: de yi dbus gyur sa bon ni //
T02D1620:164a-50: sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mchog //
T02D1620:164a-51: dbyug pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon //
T02D1620:164a-52: gya gyur rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtso //
T02D1620:164a-53: yan lag dam tshig rdo rje ste //
T02D1620:164a-54: mgo ni rin chen rgyal po yin //
T02D1620:164b-0: thig le sgra dang @164b bcas pa ni //
T02D1620:164b-1: sangs rgyas gtso bo zhes byar grags //
T02D1620:164b-2: zla ba'i zer ltar dri med pa'i //
T02D1620:164b-4: gal te sna tshogs sgrub 'dod na //
T02D1620:164b-5: shes rab can gyis 'di bsam bya //
T02D1620:164b-6: de nas drod kyi gsum pa dang //
T02D1620:164b-7: brgyad kyi mtha' dang bdun pa yi //
T02D1620:164b-8: dang po de bzhin drod pa'i mtha' //
T02D1620:164b-9: sgra dang bcas pas yang dag brgyan //
T02D1620:164b-10: shar gyi phyogs su mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1620:164b-11: de bzhin byang du drag mo bsgom //
T02D1620:164b-12: nub kyi phyogs su ro langs ma //
T02D1620:164b-13: lho phyogs mkha' 'gro gtum mo ste //
T02D1620:164b-14: sngon du bstan pa'i mdog bzhin du //
T02D1620:164b-15: phyogs kyi 'dab mar bsgom par bya //
T02D1620:164b-16: mtshams su kha dog 'dren ma ru //
T02D1620:164b-17: brtsegs pa'i sa bon bzhi po bsam //
T02D1620:164b-18: yan lag brgyad kyi go cha gang //
T02D1620:164b-19: sngags de nyid kyis rnal 'byor ldan //
T02D1620:164b-21: sngags de dag ni blta bar bya //
T02D1620:164b-22: las bzhi yi ni gnas skabs la //
T02D1620:164b-23: rjes su mthun pa'i mi shigs bsgoms //
T02D1620:164b-24: de bzhin las bzhi sgrub byed pas //
T02D1620:164b-25: lus kyang kha dog bzhi ru dgod //
T02D1620:164b-26: zhal gcig phyag gnyis la sogs pa //
T02D1620:164b-27: zhal phyag ji snyed 'dod par bya //
T02D1620:164b-28: drag la khro bor bsgom par bya //
T02D1620:164b-29: zhi ba la ni zhi ba'i lus / rlung dang mi yi steng du ni //
T02D1620:164b-30: nyi ma la gnas drag por bya //
T02D1620:164b-31: sa chu zla ba la gnas te //
T02D1620:164b-32: zhi ba'i las ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1620:164b-33: aom sum kshum yum h'um h'um /
T02D1620:164b-37: aom hr'i ta ta dha ra h'um h'um h'um phu phu phu //
T02D1620:164b-38: a'a a'a a'a phat phat phat /
T02D1620:164b-39: klu brgyad kyi dug dbrog pa'o //
T02D1620:164b-40: aom hr'i krim kshum sv'a h'a //
T02D1620:164b-42: aom batt'a li raksha raksha h'um h'um phu phum phat /
T02D1620:164b-43: dam tshig srung ba'i 'khor lo 'di bris nas /
T02D1620:164b-45: dpung bar btags te bsrung bar mos //
T02D1620:164b-46: nad pa nad las grol gyur zhing //
T02D1620:164b-47: dus la bab pas mtho ris 'gro //
T02D1620:164b-48: rdo rje 'dzin par snyoms zhugs nas //
T02D1620:164b-49: gzhan gyi gdan ni bstan pa ste //
T02D1620:164b-50: dngos grub sna tshogs byed pa'i gnas /
T02D1620:164b-51: dngos grub thams cad kyis ni gnas //
T02D1620:164b-52: tshes gcig sogs la rkang g-yon gyi //
T02D1620:164b-53: mthe bong sogs 'phel mgo bor gnas //
T02D1620:164b-54: de nas g-yas kyi cha la ni //
T02D1620:164b-56: rlung dang me dang nyi ma la //
T02D1620:165a-0: gnas pa'i rang la sa bon @165a * //
T02D1620:165a-2: thams cad dbang bskur phyag rgya ni //
T02D1620:165a-3: blo dang ldan pas gsang sngags kyi //
T02D1620:165a-4: sbyor ba 'di yis slob ma dbab //
T02D1620:165a-5: ra ma ra ma tu h'um badzra sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya aom a'am h'um hr'i /
T02D1620:165a-6: sngags 'di gnas bzhir bkod nas su //
T02D1620:165a-7: rdzas bcu dag ni bzung nas kyang //
T02D1620:165a-8: 'bum du bzlas nas bsgrub par bya //
T02D1620:165a-9: de ni kha ru blugs tsam gyis //
T02D1620:165a-10: slob ma myur du babs nas ni //
T02D1620:165a-11: gang gis 'khor lo'i steng du ni //
T02D1620:165a-12: shin tu myur bar 'khor zhing gnas //
T02D1620:165a-13: des ni 'khor ba sgyu ma dang //
T02D1620:165a-14: smig rgyu lta bru mthong bar 'gyur //
T02D1620:165a-15: snying gar rdo rje bkod nas su //
T02D1620:165a-17: zhi bar shes nas mi g-yo zhing //
T02D1620:165a-18: byung chub sems ni brtan par bgyi //
T02D1620:165a-20: ri dags dbang zhon rdo rje gzhu dang mda' //
T02D1620:165a-21: thogs shing rang 'od btsun mo thod pa dri la //
T02D1620:165a-22: bsnams pa'i zhal gsum phyag drug mdog sngo ba //
T02D1620:165a-23: snying ga'i phyogs su rnam par bsgom byas nas //
T02D1620:165a-24: rdzogs ldan yi ge 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas //
T02D1620:165a-25: gnyis ldan dus su sngags pas 'bum phrag gnyis //
T02D1620:165a-26: gsum ldan la ni sum 'gyur bya ba ste //
T02D1620:165a-27: rtsod dus bye ba gsum dang 'bum phrag bzhi //
T02D1620:165a-28: le lo'i nyes pa phan min gdams ngag dang //
T02D1620:165a-29: spro ba nyams dang yul la chags pa dang //
T02D1620:165a-30: dad pa dang bral dge ba'i rtsa ba nyams //
T02D1620:165a-31: de dag thub pa'i bka' ni 'grub mi 'gyur //
T02D1620:165a-32: nang gi sems las sprul pa yi //
T02D1620:165a-33: byin gyis brlabs pa'i rim pa dang bcas pa'i gzhan
T02D1620:165a-34: gyi gdan bsgom pa'i de kho na nyid de dum
T02D1620:165a-36: / sbyor ba'i gdan la gnas pa yi //
T02D1620:165a-38: gnas der gnas pa'i lha mo rnams //
T02D1620:165a-39: sna tshogs gzugs can yid dga' ma //
T02D1620:165a-40: yi ge'i dbang phyug dbus sa bon //
T02D1620:165a-41: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1620:165a-42: ma mo'i tshogs dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1620:165a-43: ri dags mtshan ma'i bdud rtsi 'dzin //
T02D1620:165a-44: shar du ma mo gsum yin te //
T02D1620:165a-45: de bzhin byang du rnam pa gsum //
T02D1620:165a-46: nub kyi phyogs su'ang gsum yin te //
T02D1620:165a-47: lho yi phyogs su rnam gsum dgod //
T02D1620:165a-48: mtshams su ma ning sa bon rnams //
T02D1620:165b-0: sngon bzhin 'dren mar @165b shes par bya //
T02D1620:165b-1: phyogs kyi 'dab ma'i sa bon rnams //
T02D1620:165b-2: phyogs kyi bde gshegs mdog tu blta //
T02D1620:165b-3: mchod rten rtse mo'i sgo ru ni //
T02D1620:165b-4: blo ldan yi ge'i dbang phyug bsam //
T02D1620:165b-6: chos kyi dkyil 'khor bkru bar bya //
T02D1620:165b-8: sa yi bu gar thim par bya //
T02D1620:165b-9: bdud rtsi char pa las byung des //
T02D1620:165b-10: lha mo thams cad bskyangs par 'gyur //
T02D1620:165b-11: shin tu mnyam gzhag sems kyis ni //
T02D1620:165b-12: srid pa stong nyid bsgoms byas nas //
T02D1620:165b-13: mngon sum sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur na //
T02D1620:165b-14: dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos //
T02D1620:165b-15: 'di ni sngon por bsgom gyur na //
T02D1620:165b-17: dbang chen la gnas bsams nas ni //
T02D1620:165b-18: dpung rnams thams cad bcing bar 'gyur //
T02D1620:165b-19: dkar po'i mdog gis ltas mkhan dang //
T02D1620:165b-20: dri ma med pa'i snyan dngags 'gyur //
T02D1620:165b-21: zla drug tsam du goms pa yis //
T02D1620:165b-23: ye shes lha mor kun 'khyud pa'i //
T02D1620:165b-24: rdo rje sems dpar rnam bsgoms la //
T02D1620:165b-25: dngos grub kun byed gdan dang ni //
T02D1620:165b-26: sngags kyis pha rol son shes bya //
T02D1620:165b-27: 'di ni sbyor ba'i gdan shes bya //
T02D1620:165b-29: snying po las kyang snying po sbyor //
T02D1620:165b-30: sangs rgyas ye shes sgrub byed pa //
T02D1620:165b-31: thub pa'i dbang po zhes bya ste //
T02D1620:165b-32: gdan de 'dod pa thams cad pa'o //
T02D1620:165b-33: de las longs spyod spyad byas na //
T02D1620:165b-34: der ni chags las khyad par 'gro //
T02D1620:165b-35: steng gi lam du 'bar ba dag //
T02D1620:165b-36: ji srid mgrin pa'i bar du dmigs //
T02D1620:165b-37: mgrin par 'khyud nas lha mo rnams //
T02D1620:165b-38: gang yang mgrin par yang dag rig / g-yas g-yon gyi ni mthe bo yis //
T02D1620:165b-39: steng du 'gro ba btsir bar bya //
T02D1620:165b-40: rgyas pa'i 'og tu bskyod pa yis / bde ba dam pa rigs par bya'o //
T02D1620:165b-41: thog mtha' spangs pa'i skad cig ste //
T02D1620:165b-42: der ni dngos po dmigs mi 'gyur //
T02D1620:165b-43: byang chub sems ni bde ba che //
T02D1620:165b-44: rang rig pa ni skye gyur pa //
T02D1620:165b-45: brjod las ring du song ba ste //
T02D1620:165b-46: mthong med gang na'ang gnas pa min //
T02D1620:165b-47: bla ma'i bsnyen bkur brtson pa yis //
T02D1620:165b-48: bsod nams las ni rang gi rtogs //
T02D1620:166a-2: bla ma'i man ngag gis mtshon cha //
T02D1620:166a-3: de nyid kha dog med cing mtshan nyid med //
T02D1620:166a-4: thub dbang 'chi ba'i gnas skabs lta bur rtogs //
T02D1620:166a-5: dag pa'i lus su bsgoms nas sngags kyi ni //
T02D1620:166a-6: man ngag ji bzhin sgo rnams bsdams nas su //
T02D1620:166a-7: rnam shes sa bon rlung la yang dag gnas //
T02D1620:166a-8: tshigs dgu nas ni steng du 'pho bar bya //
T02D1620:166a-9: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs su rung ba'i 'dam du bying ba yi //
T02D1620:166a-10: 'tshe zhing rmongs par 'gro bar zhugs gang yin //
T02D1620:166a-11: nyi ma stong gis mngon shes drug ldan lus //
T02D1620:166a-12: bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur //
T02D1620:166a-13: nang gi sems las sprul pa'i sbyor ba'i gdan gyi bsam gtan gyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02D1620:166a-14: bdag med ma'i mngon par byang chub pa dang //
T02D1620:166a-15: gong du 'pho ba ste dum bu gsum pa'o /
T02D1620:166a-17: // / ri yi rtser gnas ge sar dang //
T02D1620:166a-19: / de yi dbus gnas dpa' bo ni //
T02D1620:166a-20: 'dod don thams cad sgrub byed pa //
T02D1620:166a-21: 'byung po kun gyi gnas yin te //
T02D1620:166a-22: thams cad bskyed pa'i rgyu yang yin //
T02D1620:166a-23: lus can kun la khyab pa ste //
T02D1620:166a-24: thams cad thams cad bdag nyid gnas //
T02D1620:166a-25: ham gi sa bon yang dag 'byung //
T02D1620:166a-26: 'jig rten gsum bskyed gtso bo yin //
T02D1620:166a-27: yid bzhin nor bu'i bdag nyid de //
T02D1620:166a-29: mtshan ni sum bcu rtsa gnyis ldan //
T02D1620:166a-30: dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcur bcas //
T02D1620:166a-31: rlung bskyod pa la zhon nas su //
T02D1620:166a-33: mgo bo mtha' na rlung dkyil 'khor //
T02D1620:166a-34: gzhu yi dbyibs ltar gnas pa ste //
T02D1620:166a-35: steng dang 'og gi rlung la ni //
T02D1620:166a-36: 'dab ma bzhi po yang dag gnas / lce dang rkan ni sbyar nas su //
T02D1620:166a-37: rtag tu sgra dang bcas byed pa //
T02D1620:166a-38: gcig tu gyur cing thim gyur pa //
T02D1620:166a-39: der ni phyag rgya chen por brjod //
T02D1620:166a-40: 'jug pa'i rlung ni bsdams nas su //
T02D1620:166a-41: steng du drangs te sbyar bar bya //
T02D1620:166a-42: ji snyed ldog par 'gyur bar du //
T02D1620:166a-43: rnal 'byor pa yis brtsir bar bya //
T02D1620:166a-44: ji ltar mar la mar blugs shing //
T02D1620:166a-45: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang //
T02D1620:166a-46: nam mkha' dang ni nam mkha' bzhin //
T02D1620:166a-47: rang gis rang ni rig par 'gyur //
T02D1620:166b-1: dal zhing ngal ba'i ris kyis su //
T02D1620:166b-2: cha med dge ba rab zhi nas //
T02D1620:166b-3: rang bzhin med pa nyid du 'gro //
T02D1620:166b-4: ye shes 'di ni rang rig ste //
T02D1620:166b-5: kun du rtog pa thams cad spangs / bdag byin brlab pa'i rim gyis ni //
T02D1620:166b-6: de nyid rnal 'byor can shes bya //
T02D1620:166b-7: kun du dga' la sogs rim dang //
T02D1620:166b-8: nye bar bstan pa la sogs bye brag dang //
T02D1620:166b-9: rnal 'byor la sogs rim pa yis //
T02D1620:166b-10: bla ma'i lung las mchog tu byed //
T02D1620:166b-11: sa bon med cing bsgom pa med //
T02D1620:166b-12: rang bzhin stong pa gnas med pa //
T02D1620:166b-13: ma lus bsreg par gshegs par bya //
T02D1620:166b-14: khyad par 'gro ba'i bde ba dang //
T02D1620:166b-15: gang phyir chags pa'ang rnam rtog ste //
T02D1620:166b-16: chags bral de yis dri mar bcas / gti mug spangs pa gang yin pa //
T02D1620:166b-17: gnyid log sad pa bzhin shes bya //
T02D1620:166b-18: sa 'og sa steng mtho ris su //
T02D1620:166b-19: skad cig gcig gis sku gcig 'gyur //
T02D1620:166b-20: bdag dang gzhan gyi rtog pa yis //
T02D1620:166b-21: bcing bar nus pa ma yin no //
T02D1620:166b-22: sngags kyi rjes 'brangs man ngag shin tu bstan //
T02D1620:166b-23: gang yin dngos rnams chu zla lta bur blta //
T02D1620:166b-24: yul la mngon zhen dag ni bzlog 'gyur zhing //
T02D1620:166b-25: thub pa'i dbang po'i lam ni nye bar 'gyur //
T02D1620:166b-26: rang gis sems nyid bdud yin pas //
T02D1620:166b-27: de bas sems ni dbang du bya //
T02D1620:166b-28: rang sems dbang du byas nas ni //
T02D1620:166b-29: bdud dang dgra dag yod ma yin //
T02D1620:166b-30: dper na ge sar dri zhim la //
T02D1620:166b-31: myos pa'i bung ba spang nang du /
T02D1620:166b-32: nyi ma nub pas bcings nas su //
T02D1620:166b-33: sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur //
T02D1620:166b-34: de bzhin bla ma'i lung ni nyi ma nub pa'i sems can gang //
T02D1620:166b-35: 'khor ba rab 'jigs rab rib bde ba'i zhags pas bcing gyur pa //
T02D1620:166b-36: de shar ba yis de kho na nyid lam ni nyer mtshon nas //
T02D1620:166b-37: rjes su mthun pa'i lam gyis go 'phang mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
T02D1620:166b-38: dper na zas la longs spyod dang //
T02D1620:166b-39: 'dod la mngon par zhen pa bzhin //
T02D1620:166b-40: de bzhin du ni goms byas pas//
T02D1620:166b-41: dngos kun stong pa nyid du mthong //
T02D1620:166b-42: 'khor lo bzhi la gnas pa yis //
T02D1620:166b-43: gdan bzhi pa yi de bzhin bzhi //
T02D1620:166b-44: dgra las rgyal ba'i slob dpon gyis //
T02D1620:166b-45: rang gis myong ba bzhin du bris //
T02D1620:166b-46: gdan bzhi pa'i shes rab ye shes kyis mngon par
T02D1620:166b-47: byang chub gtan la phab pa ste dum bu bzhi
T02D1620:167a-0: / @167a * // dpal gdan bzhi pa'i de kho na nyid bzhi pa slob dpon rdze t'a ris mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1620:167a-2: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya dha ra dang /
